name: Kosci Zostaly Rzucone
overview: Kości zostały rzucone is a computer adaptation of the classic Yahtzee board game. Each turn allows throwing the dices up to three times with replacing unwanted ones. The goal is to fill up a scorecard with all the available sets and the highest score result. Scoring combinations include ones through sixes (school), pair, two pairs, three of a kind, four of kind, full house, small/large straight, even and odd, five of a kind and chance. The game can be played with up to three players throwing dice in turns. The game was added as a free bonus in the 1992 release of Skarabeusz.
